issue.title: [C++] Enable CSV Writer to control end-of-line character
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14907](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14907). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We would use this for alignment with `readr::write_csv()`. There the `eol` argument controls the end of line character to use. Most commonly either "\n" for Unix style newlines, or "\r\n" for Windows style newlines.
